response_congrats_data.msg:
You have completed the programme. Well done!
Remember, you can always return to ParentText to review these tips. Just type {MENU}.

response_make_options_wrapper_data.msg_one_option.message: The tip you haven't finished is:
response_make_options_wrapper_data.msg_multiple_options: Which tip would you like to receive?

response_make_options_wrapper_data.msg_no_options.message: You haven't received any tips yet.
response_make_options_wrapper_data.msg_one_option.message: You have received the following tip:
response_make_options_wrapper_data.msg_one_option.question: Would you like to review it?
response_make_options_wrapper_data.msg_one_option.no_message: That's okay. You can come back here at any time to review it.
response_make_options_wrapper_data.msg_multiple_options: You have completed @fields.n_s_modules_compl out of @fields.n_s_modules tips. Which of the following tips would you like to review?

response_description_data.msg: In this program, you will receive @fields.c_n_mod tips. You will receive a new tip each day. Your first tip is @results.name.

response_wa_templates.text:
A new tip is ready for you. Would you like to continue now?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow.

You and your family are facing a challenging time. ParentText provides tips on how you can support your child during this crisis. Would you like to recieve your first tip now?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Yes
2. Remind me tomorrow

It looks like you started a parenting tip, but didn't finish receiving all of the information. What would you like to do?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Receive the remaining information
2. Remind me about this tomorrow
3. I've finished receiving all of the information that I want from this chatbot.

It looks like you started to receive tips, but haven't finished receiving all of them. You have @fields.c_n_mod_started tips with more information available for you. What would you like to do?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Receive the remaining information
2. Remind me about this tomorrow
3. I've finished receiving all of the information that I want from this chatbot.

It’s a difficult moment for your family. I’m here today with a few tips to create small moments of connection with your child to give them the routine and stability you all need right now. Press 1 to continue with your registration. 

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Continue my registration
2. Remind me tomorrow
This time is difficult. It doesn't seem like you have the time for the these tips right now. When you are ready to keep going, press 1.

It looks like you started a parenting tip, but didn't finish receiving all of the information. Would you like to receive it now or start a new tip?
 
Press a number on your keypad:
1. Complete my previous tip
2. Receive a new tip
3. Remind me tomorrow

response_delivery_messages.msg: What kind of activity do you want to try with your child?
response_delivery_messages.metadata.description: message for choosing which type of activity to do. Types in "activity_type_data"

response_delivery_messages.msg: This time is difficult. It doesn't seem like you have the time for the these tips right now. When you are ready to keep going, press 1.
response_delivery_messages.metadata.description: hook message sent after 3 days of no response from the user. Needs to be aligned with whatsapp template "no_response". 1 can be replaced by anything (anything typed in the chat will work anyway)

response_delivery_messages.msg: Let’s get started. Press NEXT to begin.
response_delivery_messages.metadata.description: message received before the first module. It has a NEXT button, where NEXT can be replaced by anything  (anything typed in the chat will work anyway)

response_completion_tracker_data.msg: There are @(fields.c_n_mod - fields.c_n_mod_compl) more tips. You'll receive a new one tomorrow.
There is one more tip. You'll receive it tomorrow.
